title: Successful login with valid GR number and password
description: Verify that user can log in successfully with valid GR number and password in both Urdu and English languages

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select language as English
Input valid GR number
Input valid password
Click login button
Verify user is directed to dashboard home
Verify welcome banner and real-time clock are displayed
Logout
Repeat login selecting Urdu language
Verify UI language switches to Urdu and login is successful

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid GR number or password and appropriate bilingual error messages are shown

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid GR number
Input invalid password
Click login button
Verify login fails and bilingual error message is displayed
Switch UI to Urdu language
Input invalid credentials and click login
Verify error message text is displayed in Urdu

title: Network status detection during login
description: Verify that login page detects network status and displays appropriate messages when offline or online

steps.description: Navigate to login page with network online
Verify network status indicator shows online
Disconnect network
Verify network status indicator shows offline and login is disabled or shows warning
Reconnect network
Verify network status indicator shows online again

title: Dashboard displays all core components correctly
description: Verify the dashboard home shows welcome banner with correct user info, live clock, statistics cards placeholders, and quick action buttons

steps.description: Login successfully and navigate to dashboard
Verify welcome banner contains correct user name and greeting
Verify live clock displays current time and updates in real-time
Verify statistics cards placeholders are visible with correct labels
Verify quick action buttons are visible and clickable

title: Responsive staff list display on desktop and mobile
description: Verify the staff list is displayed as a table on desktop and as cards on mobile devices, and search functionality works correctly

steps.description: Navigate to staff/teachers list on desktop viewport
Verify staff list is shown in table format with 22 members
Use search input to filter staff by exact match and partial match
Verify search filters the table results correctly
Resize viewport to mobile resolution or use mobile device
Verify staff list is displayed as individual cards
Use search input on mobile to filter staff cards
Verify search updates card list accordingly

title: Attendance Schedule tab functionality
description: Verify that Attendance Schedule page has tabs for daily attendance, hours attendance, and summary; each tab displays correct content and status

steps.description: Navigate to Attendance Schedule page
Verify tabs labeled Hazri (Daily Attendance), Hours, and Summary are present
Click on Hazri tab
Verify daily attendance interface is visible with Present, Absent, Leave buttons
Click on Hours tab
Verify hours attendance data or placeholder is displayed
Click on Summary tab
Verify attendance summary or reports are shown

title: Mark attendance status using Present, Absent, and Leave buttons
description: Verify users can mark attendance as Present, Absent, or Leave; system accurately updates status and provides visual feedback

steps.description: Navigate to Daily Attendance tab under Attendance Schedule
Select a staff member
Click Present button
Verify attendance status is updated to Present and UI reflects this
Click Absent button
Verify attendance status updates to Absent and UI changes accordingly
Click Leave button
Verify attendance status updates to Leave with correct visual feedback

title: Font Settings component applies chosen Urdu and English fonts
description: Verify that selecting custom fonts for Urdu and English in Font Settings updates text display throughout the portal accordingly

steps.description: Navigate to Font Settings component
Select a custom Urdu font
Select a custom English font
Apply font settings
Verify Urdu text renders with the selected Urdu font in UI
Verify English text renders with selected English font in UI

title: Sidebar navigation responsiveness including mobile hamburger menu and language toggle
description: Verify sidebar navigation works correctly on desktop with language toggle and switches to hamburger menu on mobile; menu toggles open and close properly

steps.description: Login and observe sidebar on desktop viewport
Verify sidebar is visible with language toggle switching between UR and EN
Switch language via toggle and verify UI language updates instantly
Resize viewport to mobile
Verify sidebar transforms into hamburger menu icon
Click hamburger menu icon
Verify sidebar navigation menu slides in and is usable
Click menu close icon or outside menu
Verify sidebar navigation menu closes

title: Internationalization with Urdu/English and RTL support
description: Verify that switching languages updates all visible text between Urdu and English, and right-to-left (RTL) layout is applied correctly for Urdu

steps.description: Login and verify default language is English
Verify all UI text is in English and layout is left-to-right
Switch language to Urdu using language toggle
Verify all UI text is translated to Urdu
Verify layout switches to right-to-left (RTL) format
Switch back to English
Verify UI text and layout revert correctly

title: Page Loader component displays during page transitions
description: Verify that the Page Loader component appears with loading animation on page transitions like navigation or data loading to give user visual feedback

steps.description: From dashboard, navigate to staff list page
Verify Page Loader is visible during page transition
Verify Page Loader disappears once content is loaded
Navigate back to dashboard
Verify Page Loader appears again during transition

title: Protected route access control
description: Verify that protected routes cannot be accessed without valid user session and unauthorized users are redirected to login page

steps.description: Attempt direct navigation to dashboard URL without login
Verify user is redirected to login page
Login successfully
Navigate to dashboard and other protected pages
Verify pages are accessible
Logout
Attempt to access staff list URL directly
Verify user is redirected to login page again

title: User session persistence using localStorage
description: Verify that once logged in, user session persists on page reloads and closing/opening of browser retains authenticated session until logout

steps.description: Login successfully
Reload the browser page
Verify user remains logged in and dashboard is visible
Close browser and reopen and navigate to portal
Verify user session persists and dashboard loads without login
Logout
Reload browser
Verify user is logged out and redirected to login page

title: Attendance marking edge cases
description: Verify system behavior when marking attendance multiple times, switching attendance statuses, and marking attendance outside schedule times

steps.description: Navigate to Daily Attendance tab
Mark a staff member as Present
Verify status updates correctly
Mark same staff member as Absent without page reload
Verify status updates to Absent correctly
Attempt to mark attendance before allowed time or after end of day (if applicable)
Verify system restricts marking and shows appropriate message

title: Search functionality with no matching staff results
description: Verify that searching staff list with non-existing names or invalid characters shows no results gracefully

steps.description: Navigate to staff list
Input random characters or staff name that does not exist
Verify that no results are displayed
Verify a friendly message indicating zero matches is shown
